FuncDef: The display interface counters errors command displays error packet statistics of all service interfaces. The display interface counters errors command displays error packet statistics of all service interfaces.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the services that use recycle resources in a specified slot.
The value is a string of 1 to 23 case-insensitive characters, spaces not supported.
The value must be set according to the device configuration.

ExtraInfo: You can run the display interface command to view detailed information about an interface, such as the interface status and received normal and error packets. If you only need to view statistics about error packets received by all interfaces, run this command.
